name: NDGHolidayHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask N.D.G. Holiday Helper to recommend a movie”
”Alexa, ask N.D.G. Holiday Helper to recommend a holiday gift idea”
”Alexa, ask N.D.G. Holiday Helper to recommend a recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. d. g. holiday helper
des: Need a little help for the holidays? NDG Communications, an award-winning D.C.-area advertising agency, has you covered. NDG Holiday Helper is the place to turn for the NDG team’s top recommendations for holiday recipes, movies and gift ideas.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
